display_long_description:
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. Immerse yourself in a fast-paced, action-packed VR experience where survival hinges on your ability to adapt, upgrade, and overpower relentless enemies.
[media]
# Key Features:
**Intense Horde Survival Gameplay**

Engage in thrilling, physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.
[media]
**Upgrade and Customize**

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 
[media]
**Diverse and Immersive Maps**

Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more! 
[media]
**Epic Boss Battles**

Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 
[media]
**Multiplayer Mayhem**

Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract. 
[media]
**Progression and Customization**

Gather scrap, a permanent currency, to unlock new weapons and upgrades at your home base. Persistently enhance your character across play sessions, becoming stronger and more versatile with each run.

# Key Features:
**Intense Horde Survival Gameplay**

Engage in thrilling, physics-based combat against waves of mutated monsters. Each enemy is designed with unique abilities and behaviors, keeping you on your toes as you fight for survival.
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982499_874210870844905_8266732701765703080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=9ETQPrVtTc8Q7kNvwE1hg7N&_nc_oc=AdmQ1_XJXfhiiGsrMcqiPiRnvjsfkNIO5O-HTY0KvT0m2JT3LN-cp5LQkK2ve0Hshoc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=6jZ0VQL57Ff95IMi_YrOgw&oh=00_AfK7SoRKLPSlAC0aQj4H21ZY8h5hG46b99gQaWm8Lqyt_g&oe=68290549)
**Upgrade and Customize**

Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks.

**Diverse and Immersive Maps**

Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more! 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982581_1223888319033072_3959488854512735737_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=EXBWL7y-q4IQ7kNvwFPEITw&_nc_oc=Adk9QPSbz86dEH6qID_qKk_TSojEMaXn3SeRj8Ue_aAOmc7ik1VVfVsDPh_dTt0t4WU&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=6jZ0VQL57Ff95IMi_YrOgw&oh=00_AfLeeXJlLn-S2g7a553Z7MKsi2WaJ0EvQktScrRkMbWL3w&oe=6829129D)
**Epic Boss Battles**

Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974548_1040387177540093_112250259871580574_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=sHgzUKuVX6gQ7kNvwErjrx8&_nc_oc=Adl64N45XP5nR5EUxGXLHBXCRe97JwRgRbAyKl8piZR5Ge74C8cemwIOo7UZb8_7WCg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=6jZ0VQL57Ff95IMi_YrOgw&oh=00_AfIDZvcbUrCBXwJWvFt_IQegZD7rbn5903iXsDnLB04c0w&oe=68290052)
**Multiplayer Mayhem**

Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract. 
![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974628_1432121104166417_7819473213702105902_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=reDVX1luKnwQ7kNvwFxwcL5&_nc_oc=Adm9tpyhtDYEfCkK9SOx8nTJmLA64INKg4uTeIngXUaVRE3897g7IxujQSB_LVExPfY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=6jZ0VQL57Ff95IMi_YrOgw&oh=00_AfIz83KKKIzahbiGsWzEhrR6o904pDKvHK9FaZaqGTKB9A&oe=68291A82)
**Progression and Customization**

Gather scrap, a permanent currency, to unlock new weapons and upgrades at your home base. Persistently enhance your character across play sessions, becoming stronger and more versatile with each run.
